name: pathfinder-character-creator
description: Pathfinder Character Creator is a website to easily make and store character sheets online.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:images
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp client/index.html build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar client/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:unminified && npm run build:css:minified
scripts.watch:css: npm run watch:css:unminified & npm run watch:css:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css:unminified && chokidar 'client/css/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:unminified'
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css:minified && chokidar 'client/css/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:minified'
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:unminified && npm run build:js:minified
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:unminified & npm run watch:js:minified
scripts.clean:js: npm run clean:js:unminified && npm run clean:js:minified
